about_the_game:
This DLC adds animal ears to the characters that appear in the yuri game, Watamari - A Match Made in Heaven Part1.

Why, you ask? There is no reason why. It just makes everyone super cute.
This doesn't change anything in the story itself but again, animal-eared girls are super cute.

This DLC product requires the purchase and installation of Watamari - A Match Made in Heaven Part1.

■Included files:
root.pfs.199

No additional changes are necessary when installing from Steam.

■Turning off Kemomimi mode
Simply uninstall the DLC from Steam.

The DLC file can also be renamed in lieu of uninstalling from Steam or directly deleting the file.

※The Kemomimi Patch DLC only modifies the character sprites of the main and sub characters (with the exception of characters that appear as silhouettes) and the event CGs.

Movie clips as well as the title screen are also unaffected.
This DLC is simply for amusement purposes only.
Animal-eared girls are the best.
